content.detailedDescription:
Http://youtube.Com/watch?V=vhe2_svusjy


i was driving home, i made a turn onto my street to my apt and i saw this light reflecting on the street pole and the ground as i approached it, so i stopped the car, i grabbed my camera and it turned out to be a ufo, i think no, it's gotta be a airplane so drive 1 block ahead to my apartment buildings you'll see in the beginning footage where it's passing over my apt building and this ufo starts trolling the neighborhood. it saw me with the camera when i got out of my car and i was shocked literally and then it went around the neighbors house across the street,it was going in their back yard and i got got that clip on film thru my car, i was getting scared after i parked my car, and it came around i was fiddling with the camera because i was so freaked out, this thing at one point slows up and looked at me from behind a garage, this is not the best quality and i didn't have a lot of memory left and i was really in shock, so i tried to get everything but there was a moment where it actually peeped around the corner of the neighbors house looking at me after i got out of my car, thats when i got scared, all things combined i started to panic so i went inside but this is what i caught on tape.
for what it's worth. and no it wasn't a airplane, it was in my neighbors back yard and had lights like a airplane but different u can see them lighting up the street light pole and ground, this thing was small and it was wierd looking, almost like it was trying to be disguised like a airplane but it looked like a footbal or
something with bright colorful lights. too many colors for a airplane though, i was scared, but at first i thought i was seeing things. please just watch the video. i want to say one thing, this thing gave me the creeps! thats all i gotta say the creepers man, like it was going to get me if it found me
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ufo stalked me http://youtube.Com/watch?V=vhe2_svusjy

content.detailedDescription:
The witness passed this observation onto me while i was discussing a sighting that he had previously reported to mufon.

the witness was out on the front steps of his residence at 16 beaver street in san francisco, california at 9:55 pm on july 17, 2005. he was out in an attempt to view ufo's. he spotted a luminous white ball, which he stated "was brighter than jupiter, but about the same size". the object appeared out of a fog bank, traveling to the west. the sighting lasted approximately 15 seconds. there was a sudden change  of direction as the object went from traveling straight and level to a "downward trajectory."
content.summary: Luminous white ball sighted for 15 seconds

content.detailedDescription: The witness was out on the front steps of his residence at 16 beaver street in san francisco, california at 6:55 pm on february 23, 2007. he was out specifically to see if he could observe a ufo. he spotted a glowing orange ball travelling from south to north. just above the ball was a 747 airliner that was travelling in the opposite direction. the ball appeared to be moving faster than the 747. the sighting lasted approximately 5 seconds, ending with the object entering or traveling behind a cloud.
content.summary: Orange lumious ball

content.detailedDescription: I work for a wharehouse in south of chandler, az. as i was leaving my workplace for the day, i noticed this strange object just above the tree line. at first glance, i thought it was some type of remote control airship, but it was motionless and to big and looked to sinister, a sudden chill ran up and down my spine, it was very eerie, i ran to my vehicle nearby to get my camera, i snapped one picture as fast as posibble, as i was going to snap another it disappeared, almost like when you turn a tv switch off, "very strange". if you look almost in the center of the picture, you can see three construction workers unawhere of the situation, going about everyday worklife.
content.summary: Strange object over palm tree's

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were watching tv when my eyes were drawn to an extremely bright orb-like object in the skies over omaha.  since i am a mufon field investigator and retired usaf specops aviator, i know what aircraft, satellites, and other aerial objects look like from a distance.  my wife acquired visual confirmation of the same object nearly immediately upon my calling it out.  we both rose from the couch to stand at our west-looking windows.  while she watched w/the naked eye, i grabbed my 10x50 simmons model 1107 redline binoculars and focused in on the object.  it was during this time we noted the object was passing underneath the westbound jetliner in what appeared to be an identical flightpath, w/the airliner at roughly 35k agl or wnw some 30 degrees above the horizon, while the silver orb was on the same course at roughly 20 degrees above the horizon.  the orb was traveling much faster, possibly mach i or greater.
   we noted several other aircraft contrails at that time, and omaha pd's "air one" patrol helo was also airborne further to the north, flying at a much lower altitude.  as i focused in on the object in question, i determined it was not one silver orb, but two small orbs flying in close quarters (they may have in fact been one craft made up of two orbs.)  after viewing the object for another 10 seconds or so, i ran to get my digital camera while my wife maintained her eyes-on-target.  by the time i returned w/the camera some 10 seconds later, the object had disappeared while she attempted to acquire it thru binoculars.  we searched the skies for several minutes afterward but never reacquired the object visually.  i had previously only seen anomolous lights in the sky, and my wife had never seen anything anomolous, lights, craft, or whatever.
content.summary: Silver orb(s) pacing jetliner over omaha

content.detailedDescription: I was travelling north by car at the onset of dusk. the sun had just set, the sky still lit. i noted a strange airborne silhouette to my left, strange enough to maintain my attention. it was moving approx. ne from the sw at a moderate rate. i turned to the west at an intersection, and now the craft was no longer in silhouette as i was now looking south. it was banking slightly to the north and was awash with light from the west. i would judge the craft at 1-2000 feet altitude, presuming my perceived size of the craft is correct. there was no sound from, nor no lights on, this craft. it could best be described as being in 3 sections: the middle section had a down-slope to the nose, somewhat like a shuttlecraft from the star trek series. on either side of the mid-section, and opposite the other, was a sphere. each appeared to be a metallic burnished copper color, with what appeared to be a black seam traversing the equator of the sphere. i remember thinking "this thing should not be able to fly!" it was now banking behind me to the north, seemed to pick up speed, and disappeared from my sight over the low hills. i called the pd and the paper to find that no others had reported any sighting of this craft. i have never seen anything like this craft before, nor witnessed such an inexplicable airborne event since i was a child growing up in upstate ny.
content.summary: Saw an un-aerodynamic flying craft on my way home from the golf course.

content.detailedDescription:
Web cam http://www.I-photo.Us/webcamufo.Htm 

ufo's blue hill observatory- what is that? see other webcam ufo's at 

http://www.I-photo.Us/webcamufo.Htm
content.summary: Blue hill observatory- what is that?

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were travelling south on rt 1 and we both noticed an extremely bright light moving very fast from west to east. i have lived in this area for 25 years and hve never seen anything like this before. it moved very rapidly and in a matter of 10 seconds it was gone.
content.summary: Extremely bright light moving very fast

content.detailedDescription:
Hello,
i am not going to kid you on this, but it appeared in my picture, i did not see it when i took the picture but it showed up when i downloaded it. i am not sure what it is but it is interesting, it is more of an optigon shape.
content.summary: Do not know showed up in picture

content.detailedDescription: While driving north on i-35, 3 miles south of i-20, i noticed a lone cotton ball shaped white puffy cloud. it was the only cloud in the sky except for a cloud front at least 30-40 miles due east. i new that it was not normal at all. the cloud was changing shapes at a rapid rate.It started out as a cotton ball, then a triangular shape, and then to a spiral shape, and then went from white to a dark gray color. i then noticed a black or very dark gray cigar shaped object that appeared to hovering motionless to the lower left of the cloud. i looked at the object several times to make sure that it was not an airplane or a helicopter. i then drove by a large building trying to get closer to the object to try and identify the object better and it was gone. i scanned the entire sky looking for any aircraft and none were found.I have a background in u.S. military aircraft and experimental versions also. i have only observed aircraft such as this on ufo web sites. i was not scared because i know that they exist. i dont know the origin of these aircraft, and i dont need to know. i like my career and don't want to jeopardize it in any way. i just thought you would like to know what i saw.
content.summary: A black cigar shaped ufo changing the shape of a small cloud.

content.detailedDescription: While driving north on i-35, 3 miles south of i-20, i noticed a lone cotton ball shaped white puffy cloud. it was the only cloud in the sky except for a cloud front at least 30-40 miles due east. i new that it was not normal at all. the cloud was changing shapes at a rapid rate.It started out as a cotton ball, then a triangular shape, and then to a spiral shape, and then went from white to a dark gray color. i then noticed a black or very dark gray cigar shaped object that appeared to hovering motionless to the lower left of the cloud. i looked at the object several times to make sure that it was not an airplane or a helicopter. i then drove by a large building trying to get closer to the object to try and identify the object better and it was gone. i scanned the entire sky looking for any aircraft and none were found.I have a background in u.S. military aircraft and experimental versions also. i have only observed aircraft such as this on ufo web sites. i was not scared because i know that they exist. i dont know the origin of these aircraft, and i dont need to know. i like my career and don't want to jeopardize it in any way. i just thought you would like to know what i saw.
content.summary: A black cigar shaped ufo changing the shape of a small cloud.

content.detailedDescription: On wednesday november 29, 2006, at 2230, i had just stepped out of the laundry building at top notch resort (behind the tennis center), where i worked part-time. i looked toward the resort on the hill (to my left), when i noticed two objects with bright multi-colored flashing lights, flying very low over the resort heading across mountain road. my first thought was it was a plane out of morrisville airport towing a glider.  but i realized i didn't hear an airplane engine and that the lights seemed to go around each object instead of being on the wings or tail of an airplane.  i watched the objects just glide slowly across in front of me until they disappeared over the mountain ridge (to my right).  the thought that kept going through my mind as they slowly went over was, "please don't see me", over and over again.  after they were out of sight, i went back into the laundry and called my daughter, more then a little shaken by what i had just seen.  the next day, i saw in the stowe reporter newspaper, the headline "nasa balloon lost: probably landed in stowe".  in the article, it said the balloon was launched on november 18th, and would have landed hours after being launched.  it also said it had reflective tape on it.  what i saw was two objects, with lights, 11 days later.
content.summary: Two unknown objects in the sky over stowe vermont

content.detailedDescription: I can't tell you the exact time or date or my age, but i do remember this happening. when we lived at that location, there was a crab apple tree in our front yard. when the crab apples ripened we would sometimes have battles throwing them at each other. it was in the evening, but still daylight, someone said what's that, looking straight up. we all stopped to look and could see an object directly over us and hovering. i say hovering, it was stationary, there was no sound. it was high enough as to not see details. the next door neighbor kid said his parents had binoculars, and went and got them. we all took turns looking at it and what i remember was that it was triangular, seemed to have some thickness to it, it was gold like jewlery, but each tip of the triangle was colored. after a while we lost intrest and never looked again. the type of binoculars were a very short and i'm sure weak design. i have never offically reported this to anyone before and had completely forgoten about it until a few years ago. i don't remember who the other kids were. i am 52 years old, and around ten when this occured.
content.summary: Kids playing outside, notice something overhead, triangle, gold with colored tips hovering

content.detailedDescription:
I was riding my bike with a friend on a sunny sunday . he was a short distance behind me  when all of a sudden i heard his bike crash. i stopped and turned around to look and he had fallen off his bike and was now starring into the sky. as i followed his eyes this object which was a combination of a cylinder and disk shape was hovering over this parking lot we were next to. it was hovering no more than one hundred feet about the ground and was nearly the circumference of the entire parking lot. it made no noise what so ever but had a bank of lights that encircled the bottom and side of the craft. the lights didn't spin but appeared to be more like flashing green, red, blue and yellow. i asked my friend what we should do. he was in shock and still starring. it was at that point a humming noise came form within and it flew over the hudson river which was a few blocks away. it became a dot in the distance as it totally disappeared in a matter of maybe 2 seconds, no more. i was excited and intrigued but my frined was never the same after. he starred at the chalkboard in school that monday (the next day) without a sound and was dismissed from school. he remained out for the remainder of the week. he would never speak of it again and would not respond to my questions of what we saw.
i never saw him after i moved several years later. i did run into him nearly 15 years after the event. even then he would not talk of it. i approached him and we said our usual hello's, how have you been, what's new etc. the moment i opened my mouth and said "hey, do you remember when......." and that was all i got out of him. he was began to shake and said he didin't want to talk about it and walked away. to this day i have not seen him since.
it is really unfortunate because he is the only one that can colloberate this event. actually it is the effect that it had on him that has kept me from telling this earlier in the first place. i shared this event with many friends after it happened and because of my reputation, even at an early age, there was no dounbt i was telling the truth. i would really like to be contacted about this. i have drawn over many years thsi object and every time i recall the object i drwa it the same every time.
content.summary: In broad daylight, no glare, no obstructions and at very close range a ufo was clearly seen by me and a friend.

content.detailedDescription:
I have email and a cellphone, if you mail me i���ll get my girlfriend to tell me the cellphone number and give it to you. last night i was walking home after an english class and i was near a field beside my house, anyway i looked up in the sky and there were these.... two green and red lights in the sky, i thought they were stars at first but they started flickering really strangely and they were really really bright. they looked as if they were right over my apartment building. umm there were some fireworks going on near me but the lights were pretty high in the sky and they were moving around a bit. so anyway the red one... it looked like it dumped some other red balls over the houses because these little red balls fell out of the bottom of it and sort of disappeared before they touched the street. the green everytime a firework would go off would.... like.. flash it looked like a cone of light with bubbles on the sides, i know that sounds really weird but its the only way i can describe it. the cone was yellowish green and the bubbles were greenish and it would do that a minute after the fireworks would go off. so i went down my street knocking on doors and trying to get people to come out and see them but i dont speak much spanish and i think most of them think im nuts now. anyway so i went up to my apartment on the top floor where we put our laundry and i watched the green one go off into the distance and after about 10 to 15 minutes some other green balls appeared in the sky and they all disappeared together. so i went back to my girlfriends house (shes mexican) and waited for her and some neighbours came by (one of my students) and i told him about it and a local boy was walking by and he said he saw the same thing but from farther away... anyway i was really freaked out and i couldnt sleep most of the night..... do you know someone here around mexico city that i can talk to? im in toluca, metepec and.... i would really like someone to talk to about this sort of thing.

my email is mikemitter@yahoo.Com
content.summary: Sorry im in mexico teaching english so i dont know much

content.detailedDescription: I was at the top of the hill hiking down into the valley below. how i first noticed the object was because of this noise. it hurt my ears so bad. i think they were trying to communicate with me. when i saw it i thought it was a helecopter, but then it kept changing shapes and the colors were like none other i have ever seen. at first it was just hovering above makeing that noise. and then it started changeing shape, and i cant describe the colors (those colors were not from this earth, my mind could not comprehend them). the shapes were changing so fast it would go from little to big in an instant.  it seem it was changing at the same time. i didnt know how to feel. i was emotionless. all i could do was stare. when i relized what i was seeing i ran into the empty bulldozer below. and then after this boom. it was gone.
content.summary: It happend while i was hiking. i heard this noise and it was so loud. giant object of light

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving to a very large beach house, of approx 10,000 sq ft, to watch seinfeld at 9:pm on a thursday. we left my home at about 8:30 in order to get to beachouse in plenty of time. the beach house was located in a resort town of southampton new york  in the hamlet of watermill. the community is a summer beach resort for the rich and famous, for whom i worked managing a beachouse. i usually lived at the beachouse by myself. however, i had just bought my own little house a few minutes away and was there with my uncle who was visiting me for the first time. i didn't want a tv at my house, so to watch seinfeld, we had to drive back to the beachouse where there were many tv's. 
now. i should tell you that most of these resorts die after labor day and this was thursday night so  the beach road where the house was was deserted. i was the only one who lived on the beach for about a mile in one direction and over a mile in the other.
the unusual situations are numerous for this particular sighting as i'll explain as we go along.
as we were about a mile or more from the house i noticed an amber chandelier, which i thought must be in this newly built empty house on the right side of the road slightly higher than the road, as the land sloped upward about 10-20 feet with trees along the road and then a potato field behind them well out of my sight. maybe the owners were moving in or something. ( the logic of this doesn't fit in retrospect, however i remember thinking the house was empty and no window coverings would allow the chandelier to appear so bright.) this is because i was seeing an amber glow in this particular direction on my right and there had been a house built there a couple of months earlier and it had not been moved into yet. 
 now the street was dark, no street lights as i recall, so lights would stand out. as we proceeded down this road there was an upward slope to the land all along the road. an embankment rising some 10 to 20 feet which had potato fields on the high side out of my vision and well behind the trees.
after i passed that house, i noticed the night sky behind the trees on my right and up over the slope i just described, seemed to be aglow with this amber light. as if there was an event going on in the potato fields. my initial reaction was a movie company filming in the potato fields or maybe a grass fire. although as i drove it seemed that the light stayed behind the trees all along the road. sort of like the moon follows you as you drive along. although all i could see was this night sky lit up but the source was out of my sight beyond the trees. i started to think there might be a fire or something else, it felt out of sorts. now about a half mile from the house, which is on the ocean with a bay behind it so the house sits on a narrow strip of land that encloses this bay/saltwater pond, the road heaqds straight toward this small bay/pond and we are paralleling the ocean beach at this point about a third of a mile back from the beach. when you almost drive into the bay the road turns ninety degrees right and goes along the side of the bay down to a public beach where just before you get to the parking lot the road turns left and goes about another half mile between the ocean and bay and then ends at the turn around by the river entrance to the bay. 
now i must back up to where the road almost goes into the bay before turning sharp right. because as i turned my little pickup truck right around this corner right beside the bay and turned toward the ocean beach straight ahead with the beachouse just a ways to the left of the beach sitting on top of a large dune and i'm still about a third of a mile away from the house and beach parking lot is where my uncle and i were surprised.
over the beachouse and stretching for several houses in one direction and a couple of houses in the other above the dune with the moon lit night sky visible all around it's silouette and reaching a few hundre feet high into the sky was the biggest thing i ever saw floating in the air absolutely silently from where i was, as i rolled down my window. it was unlike anything i ever could have imagined and bigger than anything i can think of except maybe an aircraft carrier or cruise ship. and that's not the most amazing thing. it was a black dark silouette with six giant charcoal red glowing lights or portals. positioned like the points of two pyramids sitting side by side. what i mean is at where the pyramid corners would be were these giant glowing lights four across the botom and two above. (i'll come back to the enormous size of these lights)
i drove as fast as i safely could, fearing for a dear or fox might run in front of me as they were prevalent in this particular area, down to the beach and when i got to the parking lot entrance, rather than turning toward the house, i drove straight ahead up into the parking lot and right up to the edge of the sand leading to the beach. at this point there is an area where the dune has a break in it so you can walk out onto the beach. from the time i hit the parking lot i lost sight of the object as i believed it was slowly moving away from us out over the beach and ocean, so i jumped out of the truck and ran out onto the beach.
it was gone. i was amazed, where could something so big go to so fast. as i looked up and down the beach and out onto the ocean way in the distance to my right and all the way out on the horizon as far out and to the right as i could see i saw something above the water by the horizon yet above the water shining these giant searchlights down on to the water in a scanning movement. now, this is especially interesting to me. i grew up on cape cod in massachusetts and we as children nearly lived at the beach day and night and we had a big air base on the cape and my dad was in the airforce, so i am use to seeing planes and helicopters flying over head and out on the horizon and have a pretty good idea of scale and relative distance and size of things. the thing is that the search lights shining down on the ocean should have been like a speck at that distance and maybe a beam the size of the thicknessof a piece of hair. the lights shining down onto the water were huge even at that distance. it's hard to explain how huge because it doesn't make sense.
my uncle was in his 70's at the time and as i walked back from the beach to the truck he was just standing by the truck looking all around and wondering if i had seen anything. i was thinking we're going to see aparade of cars racing down to the beach to see what the heck this was. one jeep wagoneer with three teenagers showed up and asked me what that was. i asked them what they thought it was.They didn't say except they thought they had seen a chandelier drop down out of the sky.
i would have thought they would have been much more curious or inquisitive except they weren't and i was rather put out with their lack of excitement. i said i thought it was a ufo. i got back in my truck and drove over to the beachouse and went inside it was about 9pm time for seinfeld which i always watched, except for this night i didn't. when we got in the house my uncle said he thought he should have a drink and he watched tv. i don't drink and wasn't interested in watching tv. i went out on the beach dune decks and watched eagerly waiting for our visitor to return. they didn't that night. i went o bed about midnight.
the next morning i awoke early and thought wouldn't it be exciting if i went up on the dune decks and looked out and saw something in the ocean even if only debris. i saw nothing in the water or on the beach. no sign of anything, i looked for quite a while. as i got finished looking i heard a faint noise. it happens to be my favorite sound and i'm sensitive to it. the flutter of rotor blades of a helicopter far far away. i couldn't see it, but i could hear it and it was approaching and it was big.
now i lived in this house for almost 4 years on the ocean, seeing planes and helicopters fly along the beach. even had a police helicopter land right in front of the house on the beach, while searching for some windsurfers who had strayed out to far and couldn't get back. we called for them.
as a single engine pilot i know some of the requirements of altitudes around houses for aircraft. well this day i saw something i had never seen in my life. way down the beach as far as i could see was a big helicopter flying over the beach sand about 50 to 75 feet high at the most. as this big dark helicopter approached, looking about the size of a coast guard rescue chopper, a sikorsky i think, except it was military grey with no markings. except it was so low and obviously searching for something, as i thought they were going to fly right by me standing on top of the dune, i raised my hand to wave to them, i could see their two faces and even the dark shields raised on their helmets, as they reached me in front of the beachouse they abruptly banked left out over the water, i thought they had seen something i had missed out in the water. they turned ninety degrees left and headed out over the water. they proceeded straight out over the horizon and i never saw them again after that.
except about a year later i had a revisit of the lights after i had moved out of the beachouse. 
enough for now.
sorry for the length
david adao
i have sinced moved and live in upstate sw of albany in a small town of ghent.
as jack horkheimer use to say
keep looking up
518-392-0088
content.summary: Hovered over beach house where i lived then disappeared temp

content.detailedDescription: Object seems to be segmented, or multiple ufos docking with each other.
content.summary: Strange object caught in photo

content.detailedDescription: Cigar shape object appears in photo of evening sky.
content.summary: One of many cigar shape object that appears in our pictures.

content.detailedDescription:
Waswanipi hill. my coworker lived in the staff trailor which sits on top of hill which gives us a long view out on the landscape,
it was night out as my co-worker walked past the window and saw a bright light. he asked me to check out the lights and if it could be a ufo. i looked out and watch it.Fear came over me but controlable..  i have seen four sightings in my live and this was another sighting. on the west side of the hill and off to the distance of three kilometers is a valley, there was gold disk sitting there flashing and rotating the lights. then it hovered went side to side as they looking for something. then it sit there hovering. three youthes came over and told about the lights. :see those lights i fell came from the sky.They wanted to go there because they drove four wheelers. i told them get a camera first and dont get to close to it it may be radio active. i watched with dale and the lights from cars reflected of the clouds. the highway north was just below us and the lights could seen at a ditance.The disk did not reflect lights  yet it was very bright. i told him if it comes overhere we are in trouble. i sat down and took notes 
there was no phone so dale watched it while a wrote things down.
he watched it for several minutes until he went to the bathroom. when he turn the disk was gone. i drew the position and landmarks. this was my last night in waswanipi. i was glad it didn't come towards us. 
i been told there are a lot of ufo's sightings since the hydro lines were put up in the region.
directions: north west end of the town. new building face west in beween two valleys.Disk stays there for several minutes. witness dale baptise.
secondary the three kids that saw it.
content.summary: Disk lands near waswanipi,que

content.detailedDescription: Photo of these strange objects came out in a photo of the early afternoon sky.  they did not appear to the naked eye, but only when downloaded.
content.summary: 14 cigar shaped objects

content.detailedDescription: This is the second time we have photographed this type of ufo.  the first time we also submitted photos to mufon, roughly one month ago.  in this first photo there were 15 of this type of object.
content.summary: Five ufos seen in photo of evening sky.

content.detailedDescription: Was at dining table and looked out patio door for no special reason and saw a white ball in the sky.Thought it was balloon let go and just watched it.Expected to see that swing motion ballons do but didn't.Then it stopped and held still for maybe 30 seconds.It then dropped about 50 feet and stopped again.My son was sitting with me and i thought"if i say something it's gonna disappear and i'll look stupid."it then moved in a "meandering fashion"up,down,left,right no real rhyme or reason for about 30 seconds.And it stopped again.When i say stopped i mean it held still completely.I said to my son "hey ****,look at that!"he stood up to look over me and the ball slowly went into a cloud."did you see that?""yeah what is that"then it came back out in the space between clouds and i said "look,there it is again!" and he saw it again too before it reversed direction and went into original cloud.The wierd thing is,four times it came out and went back as soon as we noticed it again.When fourth time was over we saw it flat boogie out to east and left a sort of empty channel in clouds it went through.Channel stayed in same place even though clouds moved through same area continously.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: White ball shape over fort collins

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my front porch with my two sisters and one of their boyfriends. i was just star gazing and watching passing planes go by. we live a couple of blocks from a hospital and we see helicopters fly in and out all the time. i noticed a bright light in the sky and thought it was just another  passing airplane. this object was about the same brightness, and size of a passing airplane. i watched for a few moments and waited to see if i could see its blinking light or lights, but i couldn't. which in itself is no big deal. so i compared it to a stationary object to see if i could find its path or see any movement. i couldn't. so i continued to watch it for about another ten to fifteen minutes. still no movement. then suddenly it faded until it was almost out of sight. it reappeared, but got brighter for a few seconds and changed its color from whitish blue to an almost red. it stayed this color for only a few seconds and then changed back to the whitish blue color. at this time i told my sisters and their boyfriend what i had saw. at this time they started watching as well. it continued to fade in and out of sight like before, and every once in a while you could the red color reappear. then  i noticed it started to move up. like it was going further away or it was changing to a higher elevation. still it wasn't moving very fast. it reminded me of a helicopter in some ways. for example it seemed to just hover in the sky. but you could tell it was far away, and it would be to big at that distance to be a helicopter. the light that this object giving out was a very strange light. it was like a star that was kind of twinkling. the center of the light was brighter than the rest of it. it reminded me of a very small cross. but when you looked at the object as a whole, with all the light around the edges of the cross gleaming, it looked like a circle. you didn't really see the cross center unless you really focused on it. i never really lost sight of the object, i came inside to get something and when i returned to the porch the object was no longer visible. i just want to know if there has been any other reporting of the object, or if maybe i was seeing a planet . the object was in the east to n.East sky from my house. i don't know if any of this will help you guys but i hope it will. and another i want to mention is that i always watch the sky especially at night and i have never  seen anything like this. i wish i had saw more. if you have any questions i would be happy to answer them via email. thank you
content.summary: Kind of glowing but has moments where it fades until it disapears but comes back brighter, not much movement

content.detailedDescription:
Now i know why people are so hesitant to report ufos....Ugh....Anyways....I was outside talking to my two nieces (miranda age 8 and serena age 4) when miranda pointed upwards and said "uncle chris, i can see a balloon!". naturally i just thought it was an 8 y.O. getting excited from some kid losing a helium balloon and didn't pay it much notice at first. i was kneeling down talking to serena. miranda kept getting excited and repeating herself over and over about the balloon (about 3 or 4 times in about a 10 second period getting more and more excited) so i thought i would humor her and look for the balloon. serena also started to look up for the balloon. since i was looking for a runaway balloon (or so i thought) i started to look over the rooftops and over the treetops for a balloon, fully expecting to see some helium balloon on a string caught up in the wind and rising steadily. i didn't see anything and i told her there was no balloon and was ready to dismiss her as a hyper 8 year old and go inside. she kept insisting she could see it. that's when she pointed w-a-y up, higher than i would have thought to look for a balloon, and then it came into view. the first words out of my mouth (remember i was humoring an 8 y.O. girl) "miranda, that's not a balloon, that's a plane". i immediately followed that up with something along the lines of "that's no plane like i've ever seen!" and i started to walk blindly away from them to get a better view. there were no wings and it was like a silver/metallic orb. it was silent and fast. much faster than i would have expected a plane to be going. there were no contrails either - which was startling (more on that in a minute) to me. it traveled in a straight line in a north/northeasterly direction and was out of sight in a matter of seconds. i would estimate from the time she said she saw a balloon until the time it was gone was probably 30 - 35 seconds maximum. i watched it myself for maybe 20 seconds at the most. serena also saw it. i can't say how high because i just suck at judging vertical distances and would not even hazard a guess. it was at an altitude where no wings were visible but you could clearly see that something was moving through the sky even though it was pretty high up. it happened between 5:15pm and 5:20pm. i know because i noted the time on the clock when we went inside as soon as it was out of sight. my nieces were jumping all over telling my mother and my sister how we saw a ufo. naturally, they looked at me and were ready to say "yeah sure" when i told them that whatever it was we saw it sure wasn't a plane, helicopter, blimp or balloon. once i thought about it the video footage that is always shown of silver orbs over mexico city was what immediately came to mind.

here is some more info on me and the location:
i have been a professional photographer and videographer for 19 years. i am trained to notice things and remember. my sister wanted to know why i didn't take out my cellphone and take a photo or video of it. i know damn well that a 1.3 megapixel cellphone camera won't do a thing at the distance i was dealing with. i would have needed to have a high end camera with a good optical zoom (not a digital zoom) to get anything worthwhile. i had one in the car but by the time i would have gotten it out the moment would have passed so i was counting on myself to remember details as much as possible. i have also been in a number of planes and helicopters for aerial photos in the past. it was not any type of helicopter. it was dead silent and too fast. it didn't do any kind of amazing acrobatics as people often report. it just traveled in a straight line.

where i live in chicopee ma i am in proximity to 4 airports so i see planes all the time. i am 10 minutes from westover air reserve base in chicopee so i see c5 transports and other miltary aircraft all the time (not to mention the airshows they have every year). i am 20 minutes from barnes municipal airport in westfield. i often see warthogs flying manuevers. i am 20 minutes from northampton airport (a small private airport) so i see light aircraft like cessnas. i am 40 minutes from bradley international airport in ct. so i see commercial flights all the time as well. also, every plane i see these days has contrails of some sort. within 90 minutes of the sighting i counted 6 other aircraft flying overhead. i could see the wings on each one as well as contrails from each one. i did see one plane that was in a steep climb to go way up and couldn't hardly see it at all....But i saw the contrail. whatever we saw had no contrail which was a fact that i really picked up on. i know that whatever we saw was not a commercial airliner, military transport, helicopter, blimp, weather balloon, cessna or ultralight. it was round, fast and quiet. if i hadn't seen it myself i would have dismissed the observations of two preteen girls easily. 

at the risk of embarrassment i am filing this report because i know what i saw. i have tried to dismiss the sighting but cannot think of what it could have been. as much as i do personally believe in ufos i also take every single report i read with a healthy dose of skepticism without hard evidence to back up the claim. i also now understand why so many people don't have photo or video footage when they see things. i was so totally mesmerized and trying to take in what it was that i was seeing that getting proof was the last thing on my mind. i was more concerned with details so i could report with some semblance of credibility. i would be happy to follow up the report with a phone conversation if necessary but don't know what else i can add aside from the fact that i am not crazy. i realize that an 8 y.O. and a 4 y.O. aren't exactly credible corraborating witnesses but that's all i can tell you.
content.summary: My 2 nieces and i saw a sphere much like the ones seen in mexico city.

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching a military prop plane pass from west to east at a relatively high altitude.  as it passed, a light caught my eye.  it looked like a bright, daylight star.  no clouds in the sky.  i thought perhaps it was a weather balloon.  i watched it stay in the same place for about 10 minutes.  i went inside to get my camera.  when i came back outside, it was still in the same place.  i took one digital picture then came back inside to look at it on my computer.  i couldn't see it on the screen so i changed cameras to one with a higher resolution.  when i went back outside, it had moved approximately 30 degrees to the south or what appeared to be maybe 7 - 10 miles judging from it's apparent altitude.  i wouldn't venture to guess, but it seemed very high.  a few seconds later, from an apparent stop, it suddenly moved very quickly towards the south then quickly cut at an approximately 80 degree angle to the left then stopped.  it looked like it had moved about 5 - 10 miles in about 5 seconds. i could barely see it for about five seconds more, then it was gone.

i have never seen anything like this.  it was exhilarating.

i have attached the two photos i took, but i couldn't make out what i saw for sure.
content.summary: Star-like light remaining still or appearing to remain still - then moved swiftly

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my backyard feeding my dogs and facing downtown minneapolis
i looked up because i always watch the airplanes,this
time i noticed that there were alot of them flying at the same
time and then i noticed what looked like three airplanes flying
in a line but the one in the middle did not have a red light comming
from it there were just white lights around it. this only happens at night
and goes on all the time. i don't want to sound crazy but i know i have
the blueprints for a teardrop shape transportation device that runs off salt water.

on october 13, 2005 in cedar rapids iowa saw a bright blue light
in the sky in noticed that it started to blink vanish and move in zig zag
formation and zip off leaving behind a blueish green streak of light that
slowly faded away.
 
in the name of the lord i will not lie to the people.
content.summary: Airplanes flying around somthing that looked strange

content.detailedDescription: I just got of the navy in 1955 july was the date it took a bought a week to get a new car and my father, mother, aunt,and me driveing the car going to canada, this all happen on the way back to the states. we came over the boader at[caley main] a bought 3:am in the morning we got a bought 20 miles down the road they were bulding the trancanada hiway at the time and the road was not paved, i came to a guley in the road and ai was only moveing at a bought 5 miles a hour, when the road lit up amber and a bright round lite came up the road at the driver front wheel it was a bought 8 ft. in diameter and it not on the road that i could see and i was going real slow[5 miles hour]it had to be under the dirt road ,it past by the drivers window and my arm a bought 3 foot and i went on down the road a bought a mile and i could see it in my rear vieu and it came up to the trunk of the car and near the rear window my aunt and the other women got on the floor and they screaming my father and mother, were in front seat with me and they would look back and i could not get out of their fast enough fo me, i was 23 years old ,and it stop and let me get down the road a bought a mile and it came up to the car a bought 4 times just then i came to a farmers lite on the side of road did not see him ,and the right front tire melted at the seam it was a tubeless tire and the next town i had to put a tube in it. i was thinking  bought it i am 75 now and i wanted to let things out. this thing had intel it new what it was doing.   [cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: Light

content.detailedDescription: In 1974 i was living in portland, oregon with my then husband.  we had finished work, i believe it was a friday eve., and we were on our way out to dinner in portland.  it was dusk but not dark out.  we were crossing this bridge leading into the city and i looked out our car window and saw this very large disc in the sky.  the disc was metallic but not shiny and had rotating lights encircling the entire perimeter of the disc.  it was just hovering in the sky - not moving at all.  we couldn't stop to watch it as traffic was pretty heavy on the bridge and there was no place to pull over. when we got to the restaurant we thought we would hear other people talking about the object in the sky but there wasn't.  we even told an employee that we had just seen a ufo but you can imagine the response  "ya sure"..  we thought for sure the next day there would be some mention of it in the newspaper or on tv but that didn't happen either. since that encounter i have been a believer in ufo's.  the only explanation i can come up with as to why no one else saw it is possibly my husband and i saw for a brief moment into another dimension or we saw an event yet to happen.  my husband and i had, as far as i can remember,not discussed ufos or believing or not believing in them before this event.  i think my husband and i had some sort of psychic connection because one night i had a dream, a pretty vivid dream, and the next day i began to tell him about it and he stopped me and continued to tell me what i had dreamt and now at this time i'm living that dream i had a long time ago. to recapitulate i was looking out the passenger window up to the sky and saw the disc (ufo).  you couldn't help but see it it was so big. we were not afraid seeing it in the sky we were more, i'd say, excited and curious and then incredulous that no one else had seen it. i can remember no markings on the disc or writing on any kind.  the only thing i recall are the rotating lights moving very quickly around the perimeter in  a continuous motion. i don't recall when we lost sight of the it.  it was the approx. size of a baseball diamond. disc.
content.summary: Large disc approx. size of a baseball diamond seen just before dusk hovering in the sky.  it had rotating on and off lights circling the outer perimeter of the disc..

content.detailedDescription:
As ufo sightings go, this is really a pathetic story, perhaps not worth mentioning, especially after all these years.  but just in case you have other sightings mentioned in your records in or around that area during that time, i guess i should officially let someone know.

in the early fifties, we lived about two miles west and one mile south of onsted, michigan, a very small village tucked into what is called the "irish hills" district, of lenawee county, about 15 miles from adrian, the county seat.  there is nothing out there but farms - dirt roads, fields, hilly pastures and woods, plus numerous small natural lakes left behind from the last ice age.  the nearest city is 15 miles away and there has never been, to my knowledge, any kind of government or military facility anywhere nearby.  there is currently a very small airport at the edge of the village, but it was not built until sometime in the sixties, or maybe even the early seventies.  but at any rate, at the time it was just pastures and it was miles the other way from where i saw my ufo.

i was a little girl, 10 to 12 years old and would spend hours gazing at the stars, just aching to know what was out there.  my family had all gone to bed, probably around 9:00 or 10:00, but as was my habit, i was wide awake, kneeling on the floor at a window with my elbows on the sill, staring up at the sky.  slowly a yellow/greenish light appeared high to my left, coming in from the east headed west and going down at about a  45 degree angle.  it was moving quite slowly, and i watched it for perhaps five seconds before it disappeared from my sight because of the nearby trees on the edge of our yard.  we lived on a dirt road called brooks hwy., south of slee road, so this light crossed high in front of me and went down to the west of that road. there was no sound.  i got up off the floor and went to my parents' room - i think they were still awake - and i told my dad what i had seen.  he calmly but quickly pulled on his pants and the two of us went out into the yard. he was the kind of father who always believed me, no matter what.  but of course, by then there was nothing to see.  where ever the thing had landed, if it did land, was probably at least a quarter mile away with hills and hundreds of trees in between.  i don't remmber what month it was, but it was warm enough to go out without a sweater, and there were green leaves on the trees.  i feel like it was perhaps mid or late spring, but i'm not sure.

so that's it.  pitiful story.  i don't know what it was, but i do know it was not a plane, a star, a shooting star or a comet - it was moving too slowly.  the only thing it could have been at that time and that place and moving as it did, was a helicopter or a ufo.  and what would a helicoper be doing in the farmlands outside onsted, michigan in 1950, 1951 or 1952 at 9:00 or 10:00 at night?  as strange as it sounds, i could sooner believe it was a space ship with little green men before i could believe there would be a helicopter out there. i know we had helicopters that were being used in korea at the time, but i had never seen one in person, and that explanation never crossed my mind at the time ... but again, what would one be doing out there in rural america?

i'm sorry if this is a waste of your time, but maybe someone else saw something back then and you already know about it.  i don't think i want to know if it was just a helicopter - i've always been pleased that i saw something and i've pretended all these years that it was, in fact, a real honest to goodness ufo.

and i am a believer.  i've just not yet been lucky enough to really see anything important - well, actually i did see a model of russia's sputnik in their pavillion at the brussel's world fair in 1958. i was an exchange student at the time.  i'm 66 years old now, but maybe someday.........In the meantime, i faithfully watch all the ufo programs on the history channel and long to know what it's all about, and wish i lived near a "hot spot". i'm glad there is an organization that takes this stuff seriously and people who are willing to come forward with their stories.  

thank you.
content.summary: In the early 50s a  yellow/greenish light dropped slowly from high in the east  to the west at a 45 degree angle
